root.name: Minna de Jibun no Setsumeisho: B-Kata, A-Kata, AB-Kata, O-Kata
root.description: IntroductionMinna de Jibun no Setsumeisho: B-Kata, A-Kata, AB-Kata, O-Kata is a Sims like game in which you create your own avatar by filling in a lengthy survey of 65 questions and your blood type so that your avatar will behave and react to situations like you would. You can also exchange your avatar with your friends via download play and put them together in various situations.
